pr_title: Fixed method calls in Editing domain - (Task #645)

timeline.message:

---
Task #645: Fix writeExclusive method in Editing Domain to lock workspace

Removed all WorkspaceModifyOperations - (Task #645)

- Removed all Code of WorkspaceModifyOperations since call seemed
incorrect and should be captured by the ED anyway since all operations
are wraped into a workspace operation first.

---
Task #645: Fix writeExclusive method in Editing Domain to lock workspace

Minor Fixes to VirSat Editing Domain - (Task #645)

- cleaning up interface with calls to writeExclusive and runExclsuive

---
Task #645: Fix writeExclusive method in Editing Domain to lock workspace

timeline.bodyText: Guess these comments are outdated then? Is that no concern anymore? "to not let the automatic builders jump on these files in between"
timeline.author: franzTobiasDLR

replies.bodyText:
The saveAll of the editing domain was changed to lock the workspace before doing anything else (which is why the workspace modify operation is no longer needed), so I do think the comment can also go, yes.
I will quickly remove it.
replies.author: SaMuellerDLR
